FuncDef: The reset counters controller command deletes bit error statistics on a control interface.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies an interface type.
The value is a string of 1 to 63 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Specifies an interface number.
The value is a string of 1 to 63 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Before collecting bit error statistics on a control interface within a period, run the reset counters controller command to delete the existing bit error statistics on the interface.
Precautions
After you run the reset counters controller command, the bit error statistics displayed using the display controller command are all deleted. Therefore, exercise caution when running the command.
